extension.description:
Trigger an InControl Scene based on Kodi (XBMC) events via an InControl Server. Create scenes in InControl and then configure the InControl server settings and assign scene names to player events. To reinstate changes in the InControl addon settings disable and then re-enable the InControl addon.
IMPORTANT: Disable/Enable after changing settings - or restart Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: This is a port of the insteon addon - Cheers!
